title: Blood Bucket
description: Blood bucket is a website of blood donations. You can add donation requests and give donations to others. User friendly weblsite And admin can control everything
languages: ReactJs | Tailwind | DaisyUI | React-Router | MongoDB | Firebase | ExpressJs

title: Home Healers
description: Home healers is a website for home repairing services. User can easily add services and order services here. Can see their order and Shedules in dashboard.
languages: ReactJs | Tailwind | DaisyUI | NodeJs | MongoDB | Firebase | ExpressJs

title: TechTrove
description: Techtrove is a website for tech products. You can post products that you want to sell and add products to your cart that you want to buy.
languages: ReactJs | Tailwind | DaisyUI | MongoDB | Firebase | NodeJs | ExpressJs

title: Summer Sale
description: Users can add to cart the items by clicking the carts and can get a discount by applying the coupon code.
